forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password
forgotPassword.description: We will send a verification code to this email if it matches an existing My B pointer account.
forgotPassword.msgRequest: We send an email to {{email}}. follow the steps to change password.

resetPassword.title: Reset password?
resetPassword.description: Enter the 6 digits obtained by scanning the barcode with the app.
resetPassword.checkbox: Do you consent to the processing of your personal data?

popup.title: Code expired
popup.description: The verification code has expired, check the google autenticathor app for the new code.

qrCode.description: Scan the following barcode with your phone's OTP app(e.g. Google Authenticator) and press the next button. In the next view you must enter the 6 digits obtained by scanning the barcode with the app.
